3c1a153d81002878b83df957ee534f47 (05:56): 793d2c8119ea35466c485b1887b61b7d - see and add to http://microformats.org/wiki/hatom-brainstorming
793d2c8119ea35466c485b1887b61b7d (05:56): history, or rights ?
3c1a153d81002878b83df957ee534f47 (05:57): and http://microformats.org/wiki/licensing-brainstorming
3c1a153d81002878b83df957ee534f47 (05:57): history? that's not part of the proposal AFAIk
3c1a153d81002878b83df957ee534f47 (05:57): and "rights" is problematic - not even worth exploring making a format for it
3c1a153d81002878b83df957ee534f47 (05:57): licensing that links to a human readable URL yes, machine-encoded rights no.
3c1a153d81002878b83df957ee534f47 (05:58): we're not going to repeat ccREL's mistakes.
793d2c8119ea35466c485b1887b61b7d (05:58): and the message has been passed on and understood at AP, too
793d2c8119ea35466c485b1887b61b7d (05:58): at least at a technical level
793d2c8119ea35466c485b1887b61b7d (05:59): I think the next step there is actually a conversation between organisations like AP and Creative Commons themselves
793d2c8119ea35466c485b1887b61b7d (05:59): and working on item-license
3c1a153d81002878b83df957ee534f47 (05:59): yeah we need to engage Creative Commons more broadly to encourage far simpler markup
793d2c8119ea35466c485b1887b61b7d (05:59): there's another thing that AP found interesting though, and that's the idea of embedding a licensing contact
3c1a153d81002878b83df957ee534f47 (05:59): the ccREL/RDFa stuff they have going/encouraging now is a non-starter to most webdevs
793d2c8119ea35466c485b1887b61b7d (05:59): but that behaviour needs to be established before it's worth it becoming a microformat.
3c1a153d81002878b83df957ee534f47 (06:00): "embedding" is for anything that is text is the wrong framing
3c1a153d81002878b83df957ee534f47 (06:00): it should always "just" be marking up
793d2c8119ea35466c485b1887b61b7d (06:00): right, wrong choice of language, rather than concept on my part
3c1a153d81002878b83df957ee534f47 (06:00): that is, anything that is text based should already be visible in the content, and the markup should simply ideally demarcate it
3c1a153d81002878b83df957ee534f47 (06:01): right - in things like formats, choice of language is important
3c1a153d81002878b83df957ee534f47 (06:01): I think before engaging Creative Commons on a technical level, we should have a "licensing" microformat draft ready to engage with
3c1a153d81002878b83df957ee534f47 (06:01): otherwise the likely answer will be "use RDFa for everything"
3c1a153d81002878b83df957ee534f47 (06:02): anyway - be back in a while
